error_0.title: There is no connection to the server.

error_401.message: If you are not identified you must do so to proceed.
error_401.title: The server requests identification.

error_402.message: You are trying to make a request that is outside of your billing details.
error_402.title: The billing data does not allow the operation.

error_403.message: The permissions associated with your user are not sufficient to proceed.
error_403.title: The server indicates that you do not have sufficient permissions.

error_404.message: The requested resource is not found.
error_404.title: The requested resource is not found.

error_409.message: The resource is in conflict on the server.
error_409.title: The resource is in conflict on the server.

error_null.title: There is no connection to the server.

error_unknown.message: An error occurred in the server.
error_unknown.title: An error occurred in the server.

no_content.message: The section you are trying to access does not exists.
no_content.title: The section you are looking for is not found.

no_empty_error_422.message: Make sure that no data is linked before repeating the operation.
no_empty_error_422.title: There is linked data that prevents the operation.
